post.author: Ido_Alpha_Omega
post.body:
This is the first time that I've recreated anything from real(ironic, I know) life. The modelling is done, now to set up the UV Maps....

post.author: BJA
post.body: very good clean modeling. Will you put it into a game ? or just a modeling exercise ?

post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body:
The hand grip looks a little odd. The overall shape looks good but the shading at the very tip seems a little off.

You may need to adjust the topology slightly in that spot.

post.author: Kickboard
post.body:
Looks exactly like the ones from the Aliens Versus Predator 2 game
Nice job, alot higher detail, I like it

post.author: KoRnScythe
post.body: Was just going to say that.. Looks like the rifle from the Alien movies.
